summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots R, S, T and U, Block 57, Columbia Supplemental Addition No. 1; Lots 8 and 9, Block 6, Law's 2nd Addition; the north 15 feet of Lot 36 and the south 20 feet of Lot 37, Block 4, Davis Addition; and a certain portion of the southwest quarter of Section 23-24-3; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-296 and 17-241, respectively.
